net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline Default inline taglet implementations.
net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.shutdown Default implementations of Shutdown Taglets.

 

Taglets Collection.

The Taglets Collection is a utility suite around the JavaDoc tool.

It offers set of general pupose JavaDoc taglets and allows create new ones by configuration or using Java by means of a simple interface.

For more information and a user guide please refer to the Taglets Collection Homepage kindly hosted by SourceForge.net.
